divs: Sighting DetailsUfo seen darting across the sky at a extremely rapid rate. was about the size of a quarter. moved across the horizon in under 3 seconds. i barley caught focus of it, but it was glowing a blood red color. At first i thought it was a meteor but it was moving across the sky intead of at a downward angle. it seemed to be just above the treeline. i saw it driving south on Brandt island road in fairhaven. Another odd note-- intersections on route six had a light-flashing cop. just waiting. seemed strange, and they were there for roughly 30 minutes (10 minutes after i saw the ufo) this is a totaly unique event in fairhaven, its a very quiet town. delivering pizza for about 2 years and i have never seen this happen. they disbanded about 30 minutes out of town cops returned to their towns and such. area of washington street was blocked from traffic after they disbanded as well.
Summary: Quick flash of bright red ufo
